<S%H7725>So<s%> when all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> not unto <S%H5971>them<s%>, the people <S%H1697>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H2506>portion<s%> have we in <S%H1732>David<s%>? neither have we <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>: to your <S%H168>tents<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: now <S%H7200>see<s%> to your own <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%>. So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
